name: ScreenToys HD Free
description:
Screen Toys offers a wide range of weapons to choose from for plotting your screen’s downfall. Decide between a shotgun and a hand gun or weigh up the merits of a chainsaw vs a hammer!

Screen Toys is an interactive game that lets you decide what you need to in order wreak the maximum amount of damage.It’s your mission to inflict as much damage as you can!

Screen Toys™ is one of most addictive and interactive game apps you’ll find available on your iPad.

Visit our website: Screen-Toys.com for more information.
